overview: As the winter formal gives way to a glorious spring fling at Roseland High School, a young man, after years of torment by his classmates for his cerebral palsy, decides to campaign for student body president. But is it better to be loved or feared? And how far will he go to realize his ambition? This new darkly funny play from Mike Lew is modern-day spin on Richard III.
title: Teenage Dick
